original_text: He said to the priests, ‘Pick up the Covenant Box, and carry it in front of the people.’ So they picked it up, and they went on in front of the people.
korean_text: 여호수아가 또 제사장들에게 말하여 이르되 언약궤를 메고 백성에 앞서 건너라 하매 곧 언약궤를 메고 백성에 앞서 나아가니라

sentences.original_text: and carry it in front of the people
and they went on in front of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 백성들 앞에서 계속 나아갔다
